timeline.message: DB-9405: set replication role before splice is up

timeline.bodyText: @jyuanca Why we don't need to set replication role for MasterObserver?
timeline.author: yxia92

replies.bodyText: This flag is to prevent a writeable transaction. No one can connect to master and run write workload
replies.author: jyuanca

timeline.bodyText: I think it is a good idea to throw an exception is role doesn't match (or at least add an assert)
